verses.verse: בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah year הָעֲשִׂירִ֔ית <WH6224> ha-'a-si-Rit, In the tenth בָּעֲשִׂרִ֕י <WH6224> ba-'a-si-Ri in the tenth בִּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> bish-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> sim set פָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha, thy face עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh against Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְהִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, against וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and against מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim against him and against all Egypt כֻּלָּֽהּ׃ <WH3605> kul-Lah. all

דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha I am against פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> par-'Oh Behold I [am] against thee Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt הַתַּנִּים֙ <WH8577> hat-tan-Nim dragon הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol, the great הָרֹבֵ֖ץ <WH7257> ha-ro-Vetz that lieth בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst יְאֹרָ֑יו <WH2975> ye-'o-Rav; of his rivers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that אָמַ֛ר <WH559> 'a-Mar which hath said לִ֥י <WH99999> li יְאֹרִ֖י <WH2975> ye-'o-Ri My river וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> va-'a-Ni myself עֲשִׂיתִֽנִי׃ <WH6213> 'a-si-Ti-ni. [is] mine own and I have made

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti But I will put; חַחִיִּים cha-chi-yim כחַחִים֙ <WH2397> cha-Chim bracelet קבִּלְחָיֶ֔יךָ <WH3895> bil-cha-Yei-cha, in thy jaws וְהִדְבַּקְתִּ֥י <WH1692> ve-hid-bak-Ti to stick דְגַת־ <WH1710> de-gat- and I will cause the fish יְאֹרֶ֖יךָ <WH2975> ye-'o-Rei-cha of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֑יךָ <WH7193> be-kas-ke-so-Tei-cha; unto thy scales וְהַעֲלִיתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH5927> ve-ha-'a-li-Ti-cha and I will bring thee up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch out of the midst יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH2975> ye-'o-Rei-cha, of thy rivers וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all דְּגַ֣ת <WH1710> de-Gat and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH2975> ye-'o-Rei-cha, of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֖יךָ <WH7193> be-kas-ke-so-Tei-cha unto thy scales תִּדְבָּֽק׃ <WH1692> tid-Bak. shall stick

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <WH5203> u-ne-tash-Ti-cha And I will leave הַמִּדְבָּ֗רָה <WH4057> ham-mid-Ba-rah, thee [thrown] into the wilderness אוֹתְךָ֙ <WH853> 'ot-Cha וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all דְּגַ֣ת <WH1710> de-Gat thee and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH2975> ye-'o-Rei-cha, of thy rivers עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> has-sa-Deh fields תִּפּ֔וֹל <WH5307> tip-Pol, thou shalt fall לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תֵאָסֵ֖ף <WH622> te-'a-Sef thou shalt not be brought together וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo or תִקָּבֵ֑ץ <WH6908> tik-ka-Vetz; nor gathered לְחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> le-chai-Yat to the beasts הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the field וּלְע֥וֹף <WH5775> u-le-'of and to the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heaven נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <WH5414> ne-tat-Ti-cha I have given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> le-'och-Lah thee for meat

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U shall know כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei And all the inhabitants מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because הֱיוֹתָ֛ם <WH1961> he-yo-Tam have been מִשְׁעֶ֥נֶת <WH4938> mish-'E-net because they have been a staff קָנֶ֖ה <WH7070> ka-Neh of reed לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בְּתָפְשָׂ֨ם <WH8610> be-ta-fe-Sam When they took hold בְּךָ֤ be-Cha ; בַכַּפְךָ vak-kaf-cha כבַכַּף֙ <WH3709> vak-Kaf branch קתֵּר֔וֹץ <WH7533> te-Rotz, thou didst break וּבָקַעְתָּ֥ <WH1234> u-va-ka'-Ta and rend לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all כָּתֵ֑ף <WH3802> ka-Tef; all their shoulder וּבְהִֽשָּׁעֲנָ֤ם <WH8172> u-ve-hish-sha-'a-Nam and when they leaned עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha on תִּשָּׁבֵ֔ר <WH7665> tish-sha-Ver, upon thee thou brakest וְהַעֲמַדְתָּ֥ <WH5976> ve-ha-'a-mad-Ta to be at a stand לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <WH4975> ma-te-Na-yim. and madest all their loins ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֛י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> me-Vi Behold I will bring עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich upon חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> Cha-rev; a sword וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Ti upon thee and cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <WH4480> mi-Mech at אָדָ֥ם <WH120> 'a-Dam man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> u-ve-he-Mah. and beast

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah will become אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> 'e-retz- And the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לִשְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> lish-ma-Mah shall be desolate וְחָרְבָּ֔ה <WH2723> ve-cha-re-Bah, and waste וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because אָמַ֛ר <WH559> 'a-Mar because he hath said יְאֹ֥ר <WH2975> ye-'Or The river לִ֖י li וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti. [is] mine and I have made

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha I am against וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against יְאֹרֶ֑יךָ <WH2975> ye-'o-Rei-cha; Behold therefore I [am] against thee and against thy rivers וְנָתַתִּ֞י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לְחָרְבוֹת֙ <WH2723> le-cha-re-Vot waste חֹ֣רֶב <WH2721> Cho-rev utterly שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah, [and] desolate מִמִּגְדֹּ֥ל <WH4024> mi-mig-Dol from the tower סְוֵנֵ֖ה <WH5482> se-ve-Neh of Syene וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- and even גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul even unto the border כּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH3568> Kush. of Ethiopia

לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo will not תַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> ta-'a-vor- shall pass through בָּהּ֙ bah רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Re-gel No foot אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man וְרֶ֥גֶל <WH7272> ve-Re-gel it nor foot בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> be-he-Mah of beast לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo will not תַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> ta-'a-vor- shall pass through בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and it תֵשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> te-Shev it neither shall it be inhabited אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> 'e-Retz the land מִצְרַ֨יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt שְׁמָמָ֜ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah desolate בְּת֣וֹךְ׀ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <WH776> a-ra-Tzot of the countries נְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <WH8074> ne-sham-Mot, [that are] desolate וְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5892> ve-'a-Rei-ha and her cities בְּת֨וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch among עָרִ֤ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim the cities מָֽחֳרָבוֹת֙ <WH2717> mo-cho-ra-Vot [that are] laid waste תִּֽהְיֶ֣יןָ <WH1961> tih-Yei-na become שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah, shall be desolate אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַהֲפִצֹתִ֤י <WH6327> va-ha-fi-tzo-Ti and I will scatter אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim, among the nations וְֽזֵרִיתִ֖ים <WH2219> ve-ze-ri-Tim and will disperse בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> ba-'a-ra-Tzot. them through the countries פ Peh

כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki For כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Yet thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD מִקֵּ֞ץ <WH7093> mik-Ketz At the end אַרְבָּעִ֤ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im of forty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> sha-Nah years אֲקַבֵּ֣ץ <WH6908> 'a-kab-Betz will I gather אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, the Egyptians מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim from the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- they נָפֹ֥צוּ <WH6327> na-Fo-tzu whither they were scattered שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> Sham-mah. in it

וְשַׁבְתִּי֙ <WH7725> ve-shav-Ti And I will bring again אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> she-Vut the captivity מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <WH7725> va-ha-shi-vo-Ti and will cause them to return אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz [into] the land פַּתְר֔וֹס <WH6624> pat-Ros, of Pathros עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz into the land מְכֽוּרָתָ֑ם <WH4351> me-chu-ra-Tam; of their habitation וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> ve-Ha-yu become שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham and there מַמְלָכָ֥ה <WH4467> mam-la-Chah kingdom שְׁפָלָֽה׃ <WH8217> she-fa-Lah. and they shall be there a base

מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַמַּמְלָכוֹת֙ <WH4467> ham-mam-la-chOt of the kingdoms תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become שְׁפָלָ֔ה <WH8217> she-fa-Lah, It shall be the basest וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- will never תִתְנַשֵּׂ֥א <WH5375> tit-nas-Se neither shall it exalt ע֖וֹד <WH5750> od again עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim; itself any more above the nations וְהִ֨מְעַטְתִּ֔ים <WH4591> ve-Him-'at-Tim, for I will diminish לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti they will not רְד֥וֹת <WH7287> re-Dot them that they shall no more rule בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> bag-go-Yim. over the nations

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo will never יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- become עוֹד֩ <WH5750> 'Od again לְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> le-Veit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְמִבְטָח֙ <WH4009> le-miv-Tach And it shall be no more the confidence מַזְכִּ֣יר <WH2142> maz-Kir to remembrance עָוֹ֔ן <WH5771> 'a-Von, [their] iniquity בִּפְנוֹתָ֖ם <WH6437> bif-no-Tam when they shall look אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> ve-Ya-de-'U, them but they shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. Jehovah פ Peh
